attributes.action: urge an investigation into the voting irregularities in the Eurovision Song Contest 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has been concern for some years now about voting patterns by Eastern European countries in the Eurovision Song Contest, but the outcry over this year's competition means it is time for the EBC and relevant authorities to launch an investigation into procedures surrounding the voting by all countries taking part.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
